conversation.content: Look. I've been—no wait. Um. My tips. They're wrong. Again.
Um okay so uh let me just uh pull up your profile here real quick and um I'll need your employee ID if you uh have that handy?
It's, uh... what's the... 4-4-7. No. 4-7-7. Sorry. 2-9.

Got it got it so that's 477-29 and um I'm seeing here uh your last report was submitted for period ending uh December 15th with a total of uh $347.50 in tips reported is that what we're um looking at?
No! That's—I mean, sort of? But they took. More. Out.
Okay okay um so uh let me dig deeper here and uh I can see transaction TXN-9847-B3 shows uh a withholding of $89.42 but um there's also this other deduction here that's uh kind of unusual...
Eighty nine? I think it was... probably like... ninety something?

Um yeah so uh actually you're right there's uh another line item here for $3.78 that got um coded separately under reference REF-5521-QK and uh that's definitely not supposed to be there so um let me just...
Wait. You found it? The extra. Thing?

Yeah yeah um so basically what happened is uh the system double-processed part of your tip allocation and um it created this duplicate withholding entry DUP-7739-XX that uh shouldn't exist at all so um I can fix this right now.
I've been. Um. Calling about this. For probably... what's it been... three weeks?
Oh man um I'm so sorry about that and uh looking at your case history CAS-8823-PP I can see uh yeah three calls and um nobody caught this duplicate entry which is uh really frustrating I know.
So you can. Actually. Fix it? Like right now?

Um absolutely yes so uh I'm processing adjustment ADJ-6677-RT right now and uh you'll see that $3.78 credited back plus um we're also gonna add a correction credit of uh $15 for the inconvenience code CRD-9901-ZM.
Oh. Um. Wow. That's... I mean, that's really... thank you.

It's going to be okay now um the credit hits your next check and uh I've also flagged your account with note NTE-4455-JY so um this won't happen again basically the system will skip that duplicate process.
The fifteen? That's—you didn't have to. I mean. Thank you. Really.
Um of course of course and uh just so you know going forward if you see anything weird with tips just uh reference this ticket TKT-2234-BB and um we'll know exactly what to look for.
Um, this is like... you actually listened. And found it. Nobody else, uh... sort of... bothered.

Hey um I get it I really do and uh tip reporting is confusing enough without the system messing up so um yeah just keep that confirmation CON-8856-AA and uh you should see everything fixed by Thursday latest.
